016package com.exoreaction.xorcery.runner;
017
018import com.exoreaction.xorcery.configuration.builder.ConfigurationBuilder;
019import com.exoreaction.xorcery.configuration.builder.ConfigurationLogger;
020import com.exoreaction.xorcery.configuration.builder.StandardConfigurationBuilder;
021import com.exoreaction.xorcery.configuration.Configuration;
022import com.exoreaction.xorcery.core.Xorcery;
023import org.apache.logging.log4j.LogManager;
024import org.apache.logging.log4j.Logger;
025import picocli.CommandLine;
026
027import java.io.File;
028import java.util.concurrent.Callable;
029
030/**
031 * @author rickardoberg
032 * @since 12/04/2022
033 */
034
035@CommandLine.Command(name = "xorcery", versionProvider = ConfigurationVersionProvider.class)
036public class Main
037        implements Callable<Integer> {
038
039    @CommandLine.Parameters(index = "0", arity = "0..1", description = "Configuration file")
040    private File configuration;
041
042    @CommandLine.Option(names = "-id", description = "Server id")
043    private String id;
044
045    @Override
046    public Integer call() throws Exception {
047        Configuration configuration = loadConfiguration();
048
049        Xorcery xorcery = new Xorcery(configuration);
050
051        Runtime.getRuntime().addShutdownHook(new Thread(() ->
052        {
053            Logger mainLogger = LogManager.getLogger(Main.class);
054            mainLogger.info("Shutting down");
055            try {
056                xorcery.close();
057            } catch (Exception e) {
058                mainLogger.warn("Error during shutdown", e);
059            }
060            mainLogger.info("Shutdown");
061
062            LogManager.shutdown();
063        }));
064
065        Thread.currentThread().join();
066
067        return 0;
068    }
069
070    public Configuration loadConfiguration() {
071        StandardConfigurationBuilder standardConfigurationBuilder = new StandardConfigurationBuilder();
072        ConfigurationBuilder builder = new ConfigurationBuilder().addDefaults().with(standardConfigurationBuilder.addFile(configuration));
073
074        // Log final and resolved configuration
075        ConfigurationLogger.getLogger().log(builder.builder().toString());
076        Configuration configuration = builder.build();
077        ConfigurationLogger.getLogger().log(configuration.toString());
078
079        return configuration;
080    }
081
082    public static void main(String[] args) {
083        System.exit(new CommandLine(new Main()).execute(args));
084    }
085}
